1.「<cs_pchero>君！| いいところに来てくれました！: <cs_pchero>! You've come to the right place!

2.「ご覧のとおり 地獄の門の封印が| 解けてしまったのです。| <cs_pcher: As you can see, the seals of the Gate of Hell|have been broken. And <cs_pchero> needs a|hand!

3.<center><pipipi_low>ほう。また 贄が増えたか。|己が命を 供: <pipipi_low>How. Another sacrifice. It is an|auspicious mindset for a lowly species to|offer up its life as an offering.

4.<center><pipipi_low>あの小賢しい封印が解け|我は 今ひとたび: <pipipi_low>The clever little seal is broken,|and I am once more all-powerful.

5.<center><pipipi_low>健気な うぬらには 褒美として|極上の断: <pipipi_low>I will reward you with the honor|of offering me pleasure in the form of the|finest demise and the sweetest face of death.

6.「まさか 地獄の門の……ストレザーテの声！？| やたら 偉そうにしやがって| オ: You don't think that's the voice of Stretherte|from the Gate of Hell? What do you think|you're doing?

7.<center><pipipi_low>未知への恐怖は 下等種の本能よな。|よい: <pipipi_low>Fear of the unknown is an instinct|of the lower species. Good, I'll answer that|question.

8.<center><pipipi_low>地をはいずりまわり 踏み潰したところで|: <pipipi_low>The ants who trample and trample|and trample, but do not care. That's what they|are to me.

9.「どうやら 魔神族とは 記憶力に| 問題を抱えているようですね。１０００年前|: It seems that the demigods have a problem with|memory, remember that they were defeated by|those ants a thousand years ago?

11.「<cs_pchero>さん！| あなたが用意してくれた 浄化の光のおかげで|: <cs_pchero>! I think I can use the mystic|arts thanks to the Purify Light you have|prepared for me!

12.「あと少しだけ……少しだけ| 準備の時間をください！ 私が かならず| この秘術: Just a little more time... just a little more|time to prepare! I will surely use this magic|to annihilate the Gate of Hell...!

13.<center><pipipi_low>……忘れてなどおらぬ。|忘れられぬ。忘れ: <pipipi_low>...I have not forgotten. I cannot|forget. How could I forget? That humiliation.|That vindictiveness. That indignation!

14.<center><pipipi_low>ゆえに 我は 憂慮する。あの娘より感じる:
Therefore I am concerned. The|faint glimmer of light that I feel from that|girl... it may be a light in the wind, but it|
|may not be an ant's hole.

19.<center><pipipi_low>サン！！|絶対に お前を守る！: <pipipi_low> San! I will protect you, I|promise!

24.「準備の時間を かせいでもらえれば かならず！: If you give us time to prepare, we will!

26.「聞け ガーディアンの精鋭たち！| サンの秘術の準備がととのうまで 戦うのだ！: Hear me, elite Guardians! You will fight until|San's mystic arts are ready!

27.「敵の軍勢に 際限なし！| なれど １匹たりとも 逃がしはするな！| かならず: The enemy's army knows no bounds! But not a|single one of them escapes! We must hold them|here!

28.「戦えっ！！| 世界を 人々を 共に戦う仲間を……すべてを！| 守り抜いてみせよ: Fight! Fight for the world, the people, your|comrades in arms... everything! I will protect|you, Guardian!

29.<center><pipipi_low>よろしい。１０００年前の 過ちを正そう。:
Very well, let us right the|wrongs done a thousand years ago. Never again|shall we be defeated by our lower species, the|
|transcendent.

30.<center><pipipi_low>ふむ……興が湧いた。|あの日 我に挑んで: <pipipi_low>Hmmm...that's exciting. How about|a reenactment of the lower species that|challenged me that day?

31.<center><pipipi_low>クカ……クカカ！ なんと痛快！ これぞ悦:
Kuka...kuka! How painful! Such|pleasure! Now, let the lower species that|tried to kill me kill each other and enjoy me|
|to my heart's content!

32.「よく あの大物を倒したな <cs_pchero>！| けど……これじゃ キリが: I don't know how you beat that big guy. But...|that's not enough! San's secret magic is not|ready yet...!

33.「お待たせしました。| これこそが 僧侶の秘術……| 悪しき者を浄化させる 退魔: Thank you for waiting. This is the secret art|of the priests... the spell of banishment that|purifies the wicked.

34.「さあ 邪悪なる魂よ。| 光の中へと 消え去りなさい……！: Come, evil souls. Disappear into the light.

36.<center><pipipi_low>おお このヒカリ……ヒカリ ヒカリ！|我: <pipipi_low>Oh, this hikari...hikari hikari!|I'm disappearing! I'm vanishing! My grief, my|hatred, fades away in Hikari!

37.<center><pipipi_low>ク…クカ……クカカカカ！ 見事 見事 見:
k...kka...kka...kka! Splendid!|Splendid! You have done wonders to extinguish|my unlimited magic, low-born! No, daughter of|
|Ogre!

38.「いいえ 私の呪文は 最後のひと押し。| あなたを 打ち負かしたのは| １０００: No, my spell is the final push. I have|defeated you with a thousand years of|justice...

39.「世界を守る盾たらんと この地で戦いつづけた| ガーディアンに……我らが １００:
The Guardian who has been fighting in this|Land Room to be the shield that protects the|world, you have been defeated by the fangs we|
|have been sharpening for 1000 Year Fangs.

40.<center><pipipi_low>ならば誇れよ ガーディアン！|その牙が: <pipipi_low> Then be proud, Guardian! Your|fangs have broken me! That you have shattered|this Strezate!

43.「……ったあ～！ 勝ったんです！| ストレザーテに……魔神族に勝った～！: ...Oh my gosh! We won! I beat the Strezate...|the Demon Gods~!

45.「私こそ ありがとう。| また守ってくれたね……パパ。: Me too. Thank you. You protected me again...|dad.

47.「何か……勘違いをされているようですね。| 僕に 娘は いません。: I think you have misunderstood something. I|don't have a daughter.

49.「そうよ ２０年も前のことですもの。| 私のこと忘れちゃってても 仕方ないわよね: Yes, it was 20 years ago. It's no wonder|you've forgotten all about me!

50.「でもね 私は覚えてるの！| ピクニックに行って 魔物に襲われたとき| 絶対に守: But I remember! When we went on the picnic and|the monsters attacked us... you said you'd|protect me!

51.「おじいちゃんと おばあちゃんは| ママと一緒に パパは死んだって言ったけど……: Grandma and Grandpa told me that you and Mom|were dead... but I believed you were alive.

52.「パパは 強い戦士だったけど| いつもケガだらけで……今も そうかもって……|: My father was a strong warrior, but he was|always injured... and he still is... that's|why I became a priest.

53.「大丈夫 パパが忘れても 私が覚えてる！| だけど……ねえ パパ。| 私のこと: Don't worry. Even if you forget, I'll|remember! But... hey, Dad. Did you really|forget all about me?

55.「君のことを 忘れた日なんて| １日も なかった……！: There hasn't been a day that I haven't|forgotten about you.

56.「でも……君の父と言える資格が どこにある！| 君のお母さんは嫌がったのに 大丈:
But... what makes me qualified to be your|father? Your mother didn't want to be a|father, but you forced her to go out with you|
|because she was fine... and then you let her|die!

57.「こんな男に！| 家族も守れない男に なんの資格がある……！: What kind of man is this? What does a man who|can't even protect his family deserve...!

59.「それに パパは たくさんの人を| 守っていたんでしょう？ ガーディアンとして|: Besides, you protected a lot of people, didn't|you? You were protecting the world as a|Guardian!

60.「もう 自分を……許してあげてよ。| 私はパパのこと 少しも 恨んでないよ。|: You have to... forgive yourself. I don't hate|you at all. I'm sure you don't either.

61.「だから ねえ パパ……| 私に……私のパパって呼ばせてよ……！: So, hey, Dad... let me... call you my|Daddy...!

63.「サン……いいのか？| 君の そばにいても……。: San... are you sure? I'll stay with you...

64.「さっきから| そう言ってるじゃない……わからず屋。: You've been saying that for a while now...you|don't know.

65.ダンディオ団長と サンは|離れていた時間を 埋めるように|つもる話を 交わしてい: Captain Dandio and San exchanged stories to|make up for the time they had spent apart...

66.そして 守護騎士団のガーディアンたちは|１０００年にわたる戦いの終焉と 親子の再: And the Guardians of the Guardians celebrated|the end of a thousand years of warfare and the|reunion of father and son...!
